attributes.additional_details: Reverse the government censorship to stop over censoring the internet and forcing ISP's to over censor, because there is ways to bypass censorship anyway so lets force the government to admit they are wrong and remove the over censorship.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: The Internet should not be censored

Created by: Sam Nazarko

Closing: 06/01/2015
